name: Creative Ideator
description:
Creative Ideator specializes in agile software development and excels technologically in the field of IT by making its mark in wed development, mobile application development, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Web hosting services, SEO, hardware & networking and product development and management. We hold customer oriented approach and focus on deliverance of the project with all heart and soul that eventually stands us out in the crowd of other IT firms.

Creative Ideator understands that this is the era to compete, innovate and be technologically equipped. So, we are adaptive to technology and acclimatize to any technology that helps us be better technically. We thoroughly believe in being aligned and focused to what our client expects us to execute and that is what our value is and makes us stands out in the IT sphere.
